item.description: Join us for a frank discussion with certified sexuality educator (and long-time Mothers & More member!), Kim Comatas, who has spent the last 8 years teaching and talking about sexual health, relationships, and body image -- and how to communicate about it all. This 'Ask the Educator' night is bound to be a memorable evening filled with useful information and lots of laughs. Bring your questions or just come to listen.
item.name: Discussion: Not Your Mama's Sex Ed
